title: Which college is best between CBIT and GITAM Vizag? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on course and your attitude. If the department you choose is cse then gitam vizag is good regarding placements. And if you are a nerd you can even manage in cbit. One more thing is that strength of department in cbit strength of cse is 180 and in gitam it is nearly 1000.(i don't mean only nerds get good placements i meant hardworking).
